title: Which events go where chronologically: The Rise and Fall of Shurima, Rune War, and the Darkin War?
body:
I got to thinking about this while talking to some friends about the new Varus lore. One thing no one could agree on is the placement of these events in regards to one another. My thought is that it goes Shurima>Darkin>Rune War, but I have no evidence to support that other than the terminology used to describe the events. {{champion:75}} and {{champion:58}} were said to be guarding Shurima for centuries prior to its fall, and {{champion:110}} describes Shurima as a wasteland, so I think that event is probably the oldest. He doesn't recognize Nasus or Renekton's statues, which he would have if the Darkin war was during Shurima's peak, as both would have fought against his comrades or even himself. However the Rune War is still remembered and the Darkin War is largely forgotten, so I doubt that the Darkin War would be the more recent of the two, as both were called "Extinction level" events.  
Anyone have any ideas?

What **Bioluminescence** said doesn't quite work out though (and completely ruins a Lore Theory I was going to post soon) when the new bios hit live.

Here's some things things to consider.

Varus doesn't remember Shurima as it is, he remembers a wasteland/desert. So you'd think it's after Fall of Shurima right? No, it's before Shurima even became a power. People remember Shurima, they remember the Rune Wars. They don't remember the Darkin. How long and how much decimation must have taken place for people to forget about and invasion by beings from another dimension for everyone to just forget and for the Darkin to become all but rumours? How could they if it happened between the 2 other events which people remember? (well I mean remember as in was documented well and recently... no one remembers 1066 but we all know about it).

If anything it's this:

**Darkin War > Shurima Rise and Fall > Rune Wars.**

Shurima fall was meant to happen (according to the Universe pages) a millennia ago. Ryze has been wandering around the world for centries, not millennia, so that's the most recent. Plus Aatrox has been free a long time and influencing battles for a long time too, people would know him if he's still wandering about.

Because of ancient Relics of the bygone time of shurima. All the knowledge and such wasn't lost. Why would any of those things occur for the Darkin, a race of invaders which established no real foothold or culture or anything remotely resembling a society. The remnants of Shurima are everywhere. The Darkin War? Few and far between. While I see where you are coming from, I'm going to take the Rioter's word for it.

Oh and I know, which is why my opinion, even though he said "That's how I reckon it, also." meaning he doesn't quite know, isn't right and will never be heard now.

My point is something that Varus says.

"My kind all but destroyed this world," he said. "And now we have been forgotten? How is that even possible?"

They all but destroyed the world? No one remembers sometime in the last 1000 years that an entire race of invading beings nearly killed everyone? It wasn't documented?

In our own history we have documented nearly every battle since before Christ. Runeterrans can't with one that is this signficant? Yeah... okay.
Remember that Runeterra works a bit differently.
